text:
🔬Clinical trials will bring further evidence on #efficacy and #risks of #chloroquine and #hydroxychloroquine for #covid19 patients.
👩‍🔬Let science take its course in due time. 
🤒Don't medicate yourself or others without proper indication.
🏥Save resources.
📦Don't stockpile. https://t.co/GO9xrtZtuv
